General.Name: Barkby Group PLC
General.Description: Barkby Group PLC engages in the investment and development of commercial property. It also operates Barkby Pubs located in the Cotswolds, Oxfordshire, and West Sussex. The company was incorporated in 2010 and is based in Abingdon, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 115B Innovation Drive, Abingdon, United Kingdom, OX14 4RZ
